agency: Department of Game and Inland Fisheries

1.description: 7 fish per day—only 2 lake trout. No minimum size.

2.description: There are a number of exceptions for certain areas and waters (i.e, heritage, urban, special area, special regulation, and fee fishing waters), so please study the Virginia Freshwater Fishing & Watercraft Owner’s Guide for trout fishing times, dates, and limits.
